title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI, a bell sound is heard. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also produces the same bell sound.
EB: I expect that choosing SWT.MULTI should not produce a bell sound. Similarly, clicking on other buttons should not result in the bell sound.
SR:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText application.
2. Choose the option SWT.MULTI in the control.
3. Note the bell sound that is heard.
4. Click on other buttons in the application.
5. Observe and note the bell sound produced.
